channel.title: Kanye West's VMA interuption
channel.description:
Did anyone see the VMA's? What the fuck was up with kanye west.
She wins the award for best female music video, Shes like "Thanks, thanks, I sing country, I didn't think.."
Then Kanye comes, takes the mic, and says "Sorry, but beyonce had one of the best music videos of all time!". Wait... What?
If you didn't see it click here: http://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1621389/20090913/west_kanye.jhtml
Fuck you Kanye.
[b]It has been confirmed by RuneFreak10 that Kanye will only like you if you are black.[/b]

stop postin shit when u ant even registad 4 1 monf blad

This topic is pointless and is causing a bit of flame in my opinion, Kanye west did not say ‘I HATE WHITE PEOPLE’, he was referring to music videos, not the colour of her skin. Being honest most of you are taking this the complete wrong way.

item.description:
@Young_Blitz wrote:

On Friday when I was school, many people were saying the same thing that Kanye did something that pissed people off.
But, my classmates and teacher were saying that he said that Beyonce (Or I don’t know who) should get the award instead because Kanye likes her.

I’m not sure if that’s the actual reason, but from what I heard, I am assuming it’s basically what the cause is.

YEEE BALLIN SHUTTER SHADES
[/quote]

  1. You’re a cock mongling queef burger.
  2. Kanye west is a flaming homosexual.
  3. His girlfriend looks like an ape.
  4. His sunglasses a burnt jew.
  5. “Ballin” isn’t a word.
  6. You’re a faggot and didn’t notice I missed 6.

kkkk?[/quote]

2: No, but I love how you do relate “flaming”, an online term, to something irl, proves how you can’t get your 700 pound ass off the computer.
3: You’d notice.
4: The fuck?
5: Yes it is, it’s the act of being fly.

@runefreak10 wrote:

I said “doesn’t care about white people”, not hate. And it’s just a joke. A black person walks on stage and thinks a white person doesn’t deserve the award and a black person does. That’s just a way of looking at it, but I never said he’s racist. It was simply a joke. It shouldn’t have happened in the first place anyways.
